title: Have you ever been camping? Tell me about your camping experience.

korean: 작년 여름에 친구들이랑 캠핑 간 적 있어.
강원도에 있는 캠핑장이었는데, 자연 환경이 정말 좋았어.
텐트는 미리 예약해 둔 걸로 했고, 나머지 장비는 직접 챙겼어.
도착해서 텐트 치는 데 시간이 좀 걸렸어.
처음이라 헤매긴 했는데, 다행히 옆자리 사람이 도와줬어.
저녁엔 바비큐 해먹으면서 즐거운 시간 보냈어.
고기 구워 먹고 맥주도 마시면서 얘기했어.
밤에는 모닥불 피우고 마시멜로 구워 먹었어.
아침에 일어나니까 새소리에 눈 떴는데, 기분이 상쾌했어.
english: Last summer, I went camping with friends.
It was a campground in Gangwon-do, and the natural environment was really nice.
We used a tent we had reserved in advance, and brought the rest of the equipment ourselves.
It took some time to set up the tent after arriving.
It was our first time so we struggled, but fortunately the person next to us helped.
During the day, we also played in the water at a nearby valley.
In the evening, we had a good time having a barbecue.
We grilled meat, drank beer, and talked.
At night, we made a campfire and roasted marshmallows.
There were really many stars, so we admired them.
When I woke up in the morning, I opened my eyes to bird sounds, and I felt refreshed.
I definitely want to go again next time.
